about_the_game:
Unbreaded is a platformer adventure that unfolds within the enchanted walls of a once-charming bakery, now a battleground between the art of traditional baking and the cold machinery of modern industrialization.

  • key Features

  • Unique Narrative: Embark on a heartwarming yet perilous journey as a gingerbread man brought to life by a passionate chef, fights to protect his legacy from an evil corporation.

  • Diverse Environments: Explore hand-crafted locations, each with its own atmosphere, puzzles, and enemies. From the comforting ambiance of a quaint cafe to the dangerous machinery of an industrial kitchen, the game world is rich with detail.

  • Engaging Combat: Fight your way against brainless breaded brutes. Utilize a mix of strategy and reflexes to navigate through battles, employing a creative arsenal that's as unconventional as it is effective.

  • Puzzle Solving: Outsmart the sharp, combustible, and crushing kitchen landscape as ordinary appliances turn lethal! You must think creatively and use the environment to your advantage.

  • Unbreaded is a tale of resistance, hope, and heart against greed. Brake the mould with our gingerbread hero and rise to the challenge. Will you crumble under pressure or restore flavour to this bakery corrupted by the tasteless tide of commercialism?


Unbreaded is a platformer adventure game where a gingerbread man, carefully crafted by a passionate chef, fights back against a greedy corporation fixed on industrializing their artisan bakery.

name: Unbreaded

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version 1909 revision .1350 or higher, or versions 2004 and 20H2 revision .789 or higher.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1050

short_description: Unbreaded is a side-scrolling adventure game where you navigate a gingerbread man through a bakery battleground, blending puzzle-solving with dynamic combat against animated kitchenware, all set within a heartfelt story of creation and rebellion against industrialization.
